credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1941, Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
1941, Museum for the Arts of Decoration of the Cooper Union
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Sampler with a single alphabet at the top, and dominated by a very stylized basket of flowers. With the date 1821, the initials CL, and the name Sarah Lands.
name: Sampler
